
                              Seam XML Module
                               3.0.0 Beta1

 What is it?
 ===========

 The Seam 3 XML Module allows for CDI beans to be configured via XML.

 Contents of distribution
 ========================

 docs/

    API Docs and reference guide.
  
 examples/

    Seam XML examples
  
 ...
